DOC.brief_summary: A meta-analysis to compare outcomes of drug eluting stents (DES) versus bare metal stent (BMS) in saphenous vein graft (SVG) disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Meta-analysis of Drug Eluting Stents Versus Bare Metal Stents in Saphenous Vein Graft Disease
DOC.detailed_description: To compare outcomes (death, myocardial infarction, target vessel revascularization) of drug eluting stent versus bare metal stent in saphenous vein graft disease.
DOC.criteria: CABG disease randomized studies not randomized studies studies reporting composite and not single endpoints, duplicate reporting
